    • Method Detail

      • memorize

        public void memorize(int i,
            Card card)
        Add a card to memory, if memory is full a random old card will be discarded
        Parameters:
        i - index of card in Game class being memorized
        card - card being added to memory

      • remember

        public int remember(Card card)
        search memory for a copy of card being given as parameter
        Parameters:
        card - card being searched from memory
        Returns:
        index of card if found, else -1 is returned as failure

      • guess

        public int guess(ArrayList<Integer> availableIndexes)
        selects a new card randomly from available selections not already in memory
        Parameters:
        availableIndexes - list of legal card selections
        Returns:
        index to new random selection
